heading: Fact Dose — Daily Civic Brief
subtext: Get a neutral, 60-second civic briefing twice a day: laws, rights, policy changes, and verified public-interest updates.

examples.title: RTI Deadline Reminder
examples.blurb: RTI responses must be sent within 30 days by public authorities; know your escalation path if delayed.

examples.title: Consumer Rights Tip
examples.blurb: If a seller refuses a refund for a defective item within warranty, you can file a complaint in the district forum.

examples.title: Civic Alert
examples.blurb: Municipal portal now lets you track road repair requests live — submit a geo-tagged photo.
